endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: Hello, my name is Suno. And, uh — and I like pizza. [laughs] But I also have other interests such as playing tic tac toe.

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: Hello, my name is Suno. And, uh — and I like pizza. [laughs] But I also have other interests such as playing tic tac toe.

parameters.name: text_temp

param_schema.title: Text Temp
param_schema.description: generation temperature (1.0 more diverse, 0.0 more conservative)
